body: margin: 0 auto; font-family: "Nunito Light","Open Sans", sans-serif; line-height: 1.25; color: rgb(60,72,88); max-width: 900px; text-align: center;
table: border: 1px solid #ccc; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 100%; table-layout: fixed;
tr_qheader: background-color: #f8f8f8; border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: .35em; font-weight: bold;
th: padding: .625em; text-align: left; font-size: .85em; letter-spacing: .1em; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center;
td_question_level2: padding: .625em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; padding-left: 2em
